title: Development of Learning Design Tools for Science Teachers: Application of Design-Based Research

context.prior_knowledge: Core science curriculum knowledge and exposure to online educational environments
context.additional_context: In-service science teachers participate in the development of learning design tools, conducting design-based research (DBR) that incorporates user experience. Compares two tools (WebCollage, Learning Designer) to explore optimal representation methods.

learning_goals: Learners can compare and analyze three or more learning design representation formats (tables, visual maps, scenarios).
Learners can evaluate the four dimensions of learning design tools (format, organization, support system, contextualization) and propose improvement plans.
Learners can develop project-based science education designs for collaborative learning scenarios and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
